dict.string: Perplexity Overlay needs screen recording permission to capture screenshots for AI assistance.
Perplexity Overlay needs accessibility permission to detect screen content and provide contextual AI assistance.
Perplexity Overlay needs to control Safari to send prompts to Perplexity AI and retrieve responses.
Perplexity Overlay may use the camera for enhanced features.
Perplexity Overlay may use the microphone for voice input features.
Perplexity Overlay needs access to your Desktop to save screenshots.
Perplexity Overlay needs access to your Documents folder to save and read files.
Perplexity Overlay needs access to your Downloads folder to manage files.
